snippet: Stewart-Haas Racing has selected Austin Dillon to drive Tony Stewart’s No. 14 Chevrolet this week at Michigan International Speedway.
abstract: Stewart-Haas Racing selects Austin Dillon to drive Tony Stewart’s No 14 Chevrolet at Michigan International Speedway; Stewart continues to recover from broken right leg sustained in sprint car crash Aug 5 at Southern Iowa Speedway.
lead_paragraph: Stewart-Haas Racing has selected Austin Dillon to drive Tony Stewart’s No. 14 Chevrolet this week at Michigan International Speedway.
